model.marker

Class AbstractEarthQuakeMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.AbstractMarker
      • de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker
        • model.marker.AbstractEarthQuakeMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker, java.lang.Comparable<AbstractEarthQuakeMarker>, CustomizedMarker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LandEarthQuakeMarker, OceanEarthQuakeMarker

    public abstract class AbstractEarthQuakeMarker
extends de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker
implements CustomizedMarker, java.lang.Comparable<AbstractEarthQuakeMarker>

    AbstractEarthQuakeMarker

    Defines the common behaviour of Earth quake markers and Natural ordering of Earthquake Markers

    Since:
    22/7/2019
    See Also:
    LandEarthQuakeMarker, OceanEarthQuakeMarker, CustomizedMarker

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker

        radius

      • Fields inherited from class de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.AbstractMarker

        color, hidden, highlightColor, highlightStrokeColor, id, location, properties, selected, strokeColor, strokeWeight

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractEarthQuakeMarker(de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.data.PointFeature feature)
      PointFeature constructor that takes a point feature to initialize the SimplePointMarker implementation using the super constructor with location of Feature also setting the properties of the earthquake marker (properties of simplepointmarker ) using the Map of properties of each feature, and getting the magnitude from properties and putting radius property times a value of magnitude to determine size of marker based on magnitude and setting the inherited radius property of simple point marker to a value based on magnitude

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCityInThreat(de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.utils.ScreenPosition city)
      Adds cities that are in threat circle to Earthquake.
      void clearCities()
      Clears all cities from the threat circle of the earthquake
      int compareTo(AbstractEarthQuakeMarker anotherEarthquakeMarker)
      Defines the Natural ordering of Earthquake Markers to be in descending order due to Magnitude.
      void draw(processing.core.PGraphics pg, float x, float y)
      Draws a special marker due to the specified code using PGraphics and x,y positions since this is an abstract class, this is a normal implementation that is inherited and changed due to the actual type changing when calling the drawMarker method of CustomizedMarker interface

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractEarthQuakeMarker

        public AbstractEarthQuakeMarker(de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.data.PointFeature feature)
        PointFeature constructor that takes a point feature to initialize the SimplePointMarker implementation using the super constructor with location of Feature also setting the properties of the earthquake marker (properties of simplepointmarker ) using the Map of properties of each feature, and getting the magnitude from properties and putting radius property times a value of magnitude to determine size of marker based on magnitude and setting the inherited radius property of simple point marker to a value based on magnitude
        Parameters:
        feature - PointFeature representing the earthquake data at a certain location

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PGraphics pg,
                 float x,
                 float y)
        Draws a special marker due to the specified code using PGraphics and x,y positions since this is an abstract class, this is a normal implementation that is inherited and changed due to the actual type changing when calling the drawMarker method of CustomizedMarker interface
        Overrides:
        draw in class de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker
        Parameters:
        pg - PGgraphics to render graphics of the marker
        x - float for x-coordinate
        y - float for y-coordinate

      • addCityInThreat

        public void addCityInThreat(de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.utils.ScreenPosition city)
        Adds cities that are in threat circle to Earthquake. used by the map in mouse Released to add the cities in threat circle throw IllegalArgumentException if something else rather than a city is sent
        Parameters:
        city - ScreenPositon holding the city marker location

      • clearCities

        public void clearCities()
        Clears all cities from the threat circle of the earthquake

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(AbstractEarthQuakeMarker anotherEarthquakeMarker)
        Defines the Natural ordering of Earthquake Markers to be in descending order due to Magnitude. Does Referential check to check whether it's the same object in memory, if so returns 0 directly for equality Doesn't accept null throwing NullPointerException uses Float.compare with reversed arguments to reverse the order of magnitudes
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<AbstractEarthQuakeMarker>
        Parameters:
        anotherEarthquakeMarker -
        Returns:
